titleStmt.title: An act for the better suppressing Tories, robbers and rapparees and for preventing robberies, burglaries, and other hainous crimes.
Public General Acts. 1695. 7 Gui.III.c.21
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Anno Regni Septimo Gulielmi Tertii.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College, Dublin, Library.
